item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Garabet Ibraileanu
item.description: "O iubire provocată de cauze conştiente, de calităţi pentru care dicţionarul are cuvinte, de însuşiri externe, o iubire acordată ca un premiu pentru calităţi estetice, morale şi intelectuale, o iubire pe care o poţi justifica nu este iubire." -- Garabet Ibraileanu

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Garabet Ibraileanu
item.description: "Tot ce se realizează se împuţinează şi se trivializează." -- Garabet Ibraileanu

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Mihail Sebastian
item.description: "Sa fugi de tine o zi, doua, douazeci nu e usor, dar nici imposibil. Faci matematici sau marxism ca S.T.H., faci sionism ca Winkler, citesti carti ca mine, umbli dupa femei sau joci sah, sau te dai cu capul de pereti. Dar intr-o zi, intr-un minut de neatentie, te intalnesti cu tine insuti la un colt de suflet, cum te-ai intalni la un colt de strada cu un creditor de care te-ai ferit zadarnic. Dai ochii cu tine si atunci intelegi cat de inutile sunt toate evadarile din aceasta inchisoare fara ziduri, fara porti si fara gratii, din aceasta inchisoare care este insasi viata ta." -- Mihail Sebastian

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by William Ernest Henley
item.description: "It matters not how strait the gate, How charged with punishments the scroll, I am the master of my fate: I am the captain of my soul." -- William Ernest Henley

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Jules Renard
item.description: "When I think of all the books still left for me to read, I am certain of further happiness." -- Jules Renard

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Marin Sorescu
item.description: "Am legat copacii la ochi Cu-o basma verde Şi le-am spus să mă găsească. Şi copacii m-au găsit imediat Cu un hohot de frunze. Am legat păsările la ochi Cu-o basma de nori Şi le-am spus să mă găsească. Şi păsările m-au găsit Cu un cântec. Am legat tristeţea la ochi Cu un zâmbet, Şi tristeţea m-a găsit a doua zi Într-o iubire. Am legat soarele la ochi Cu nopţile mele Şi i-am spus să mă găsească. Eşti acolo, a zis soarele, După timpul acela, Nu te mai ascunde. Nu te mai ascunde, Mi-au zis toate lucrurile Şi toate sentimentele Pe care am încercat să le leg La ochi." -- Marin Sorescu

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Octavian Paler
item.description: "Adevărata măsură a vieţii unui om nu se poate obţine decât prin lipsa de măsură, dorind fără măsură, îndrăznind fără măsură, iubind fără măsură." -- Octavian Paler

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Jules Renard
item.description: "There are moments when everything goes well; don't be frightened, it won't last." -- Jules Renard

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Octavian Paler
item.description: "Nu exista pustiu. Exista doar incapacitatea noastra de a umple golul in care traim..." -- Octavian Paler

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Jules Renard
item.description: "If one were to build the house of happiness, the largest space would be the waiting room." -- Jules Renard

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Antoine De Saint-Exupery
item.description: "True love begins when nothing is looked for in return." -- Antoine De Saint-Exupery

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Jules Renard
item.description: "Paradise does not exist, but we must nonetheless strive to be worthy of it." -- Jules Renard

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Jean-Paul Sartre
item.description: "Man is condemned to be free; because once thrown into the world, he is responsible for everything he does. It is up to you to give [life] a meaning." -- Jean-Paul Sartre

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Jules Renard
item.description: "I am never bored; to be bored is an insult to one's self." -- Jules Renard

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "Good judgment comes from experience, and experience comes from bad judgment." -- Rita Mae Brown

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "There is always something left to love." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Jose Saramago
item.description: "Forgive me if what has seemed little to you, to me is all." -- Jose Saramago

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "Judge a man by his questions rather than by his answers." -- Voltaire

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "I never said it would be easy, I only said it would be worth it." -- Mae West

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by William Blake
item.description: "To see a World in a Grain of Sand And a Heaven in a Wild Flower, Hold Infinity in the palm of your hand And Eternity in an hour." -- William Blake

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Socrates
item.description: "Wonder is the beginning of wisdom." -- Socrates

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Joseph Conrad
item.description: "We live as we dream--alone...." -- Joseph Conrad

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I warn you, if you bore me, I shall take my revenge." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "Believe only half of what you see and nothing that you hear." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Fyodor Dostoevsky
item.description: "Man only likes to count his troubles; he doesn't calculate his happiness." -- Fyodor Dostoevsky

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "Believe those who are seeking the truth. Doubt those who find it." -- Andre Gide

item.title: Alisu' add a quote by Plato
item.description: "Only the dead have seen the end of war." -- Plato
